features.title: Learning Styles Quizzes
features.description: Helps students identify their preferred learning approaches and reflect on study habits. Grounded in cognitive science, it guides users toward research-backed strategies tailored to their strengths.

features.title: Note-taking Strategies Quiz
features.description: Helps students assess their note-taking habits and discover effective, science-backed techniques. It encourages self-reflection and recommends strategies to enhance comprehension and retention.

features.title: Resource Hub
features.description: Offers a streamlined way to explore cognitive science principles and effective study strategies. It provides quick access to research-backed insights, practical tools, and curated resources to enhance learning.

features.title: Community
features.description: The Community feature enables students to connect with peers and form study groups, fostering collaborative learning. It provides a space to practice learning styles, share note-taking techniques, and apply cognitive science strategies in real-world study sessions.

features.title: Spaced Repetition Study Planner
features.description: Helps students build optimized study schedules based on cognitive science principles, ensuring efficient long-term retention.
